snippet: Efforts to end double dipping — when a legislator collects both a salary and pension — were fruitless this year, but politicians with eyes on the governor’s seat say they are in favor of a ban.
lead_paragraph: Efforts to end double dipping — when a legislator collects both a salary and pension — were fruitless this year, but politicians with eyes on the governor’s seat say they are in favor of a ban.

headline.main: After Setbacks, a Ban on Double Dipping Could Gain Traction
headline.print_headline: After Setbacks, a Ban on Double Dipping Could Gain Traction
